Text: Delivery Status Notification RelayThis is an automatically generated Delivery Status Notification Your message has been successfully relayed to the following recipients but the requested delivery status notifications may not be generated by the destination Inline attachment follows From OENRONOUNACNRECIPIENTSCNMHEARD To CC Brogan Theresa T OENRONOUNACNRECIPIENTSCNTBROGAN Date Friday October GMT Subject Mr Marovich Pursuant to Theresa Brogans request we have prepared and attach for your review a draft Assignment and Assumption Agreement among Enron North America Corp ENA ECT Investments Inc ECTI and Morgan Stanley Co Incorporated Morgan whereby ENA assigns all its rights title interests and obligations in Account No C to ECTI I am also attaching a draft dupe letter re same Please let me know if the attached documents are acceptable and we will process for signature Thank you Marie Heard Senior Legal Specialist Enron North America Corp Phone Fax assignmorgan stanleydoc assigndupe ltrdoc

Delivery Status Notification RelayThis is an automatically generated Delivery Status Notification Your message has been successfully relayed to the following recipients but the requested delivery status notifications may not be generated by the destination Inline attachment follows From OENRONOUNACNRECIPIENTSCNMHEARD To CC Cook Mary OENRONOUNACNRECIPIENTSCNMCOOK Lech Kalembka Email Date Monday November GMT Subject The address for Reliant Energy Services Inc is Louisiana Houston Texas Please let me know if you need anything else Marie Heard Senior Legal Specialist Enron North America Corp Phone Fax Original Message From Cook Mary Sent Monday November AM To Heard Marie Subject FW Reliant UCC filing Please coordinate with Leslie Hansen Original Message From Man Wai Lau ManWai WTCOMENRON Sent Monday November PM To Cook Mary Cc Lech Kalembka Ruth He Subject Reliant UCC filing In preparing to file the UCC against Reliant entities kindly provide us with a street address for Reliant Energy Services Inc We know it is a Delaware corporation We have obtained its organizational ID We are using the Calgary address provided by Leslie Hansen on for Reliant Energy Services Canada Ltd We are using the Smith St Houston address for the Enron entitiies as the secured parties Kindly advise if our understanding is incorrect Tks From MWL with best regards NOTE The information in this email is confidential and may be legally privileged If you are not the intended recipient you must not read use or disseminate the information Although this email and any attachments are believed to be free of any virus or other defect that might affect any computer system into which it is received and opened it is the responsibility of the recipient to ensure that it is virus free and no responsibility is accepted by Cadwalader Wickersham Taft for any loss or damage arising in any way from its use

Delivery Status Notification RelayThis is an automatically generated Delivery Status Notification Your message has been successfully relayed to the following recipients but the requested delivery status notifications may not be generated by the destination Inline attachment follows From OENRONOUNACNRECIPIENTSCNMHEARD To Date Monday November GMT Subject Original Message From Heard Marie Sent Monday November AM To Cc Sacks Edward Williams Jason R Credit St Clair Carol Koehler Anne C Sager Elizabeth Subject Master Netting Agreement Pursuant to Lora Kinners request I am attaching our form master netting agreement The lawyer who will be working with you is Anne Koehler She is out of the office at a seminar and will be returning on Thursday November Please let me know if you have any questions or need anything else Marie Heard Senior Legal Specialist Enron North America Corp Phone Fax Master Netting Security Agmnt h vdoc Master Netting Agreement Credit Support Annex ddoc

Delivery Status Notification RelayThis is an automatically generated Delivery Status Notification Your message has been successfully relayed to the following recipients but the requested delivery status notifications may not be generated by the destination Inline attachment follows From OENRONOUNACNRECIPIENTSCNMHEARD To esscom CC Sayre Frank OENRONOUNACNRECIPIENTSCNFSAYRE Date Tuesday November GMT Subject Hi Dana We have received the original copy of the ISDA Master Agreement In looking through the supporting documents we noted two outstanding items We did not receive an original signed IRS Tax Form W as required pursuant to Part a and The Certificate of Incumbency we received was not an original and was dated November We would like to receive an original certificate dated a current date If you have any questions please do not hesitate to contact either Frank or me We look forward to receiving this documentation Marie Marie Heard Senior Legal Specialist Enron North America Corp Phone Fax

Delivery Status Notification RelayThis is an automatically generated Delivery Status Notification Your message has been successfully relayed to the following recipients but the requested delivery status notifications may not be generated by the destination Inline attachment follows From OENRONOUNACNRECIPIENTSCNTJONES To CC Taylor Mark E Legal OENRONOUNACNRECIPIENTSCNMTAYLO Date Tuesday October GMT Subject Per our conversation last week please ensure that Mark Taylor and I are your initial point of contact with respect to compliance with andor violations by Enron North America Corp with respect to NYMEX position limits Please fax Mark Taylor a copy of any correspondence with respect to our position limits Your assistance with this will help us monitor and maintain Enrons compliance with NYMEX rules In addition if you are able to give us a call when you see an issue ahead we may well be able to resolve it before it becomes a problem As you requested below is the contact information for Mark and myself Mark E Taylor Vice President and General Counsel Telephone Fax email Tana L Jones Sr Legal Specialist Telephone Fax email

Delivery Status Notification RelayThis is an automatically generated Delivery Status Notification Your message has been successfully relayed to the following recipients but the requested delivery status notifications may not be generated by the destination Inline attachment follows From OENRONOUNACNRECIPIENTSCNLKITCHEN To CC Steffes James D OENRONOUNACNRECIPIENTSCNJSTEFFE Date Wednesday January GMT Subject Shawn We have had a lot of discussion on the contractual arrangements we would need to put in place in order to recommence trading as quickly as possible I am working on producing a fuller list for you today However there is one particular contractlicence which does require special treatment Power Marketing Licence to be granted by FERC In order to ensure that we start this process as quickly as possible we are looking to complete the filing documentation in advance of the bankruptcy decision on our future Our current strategy is as follows all dates are approximate Present January th Complete filing documentation January th Visit with FERC One of senior executives here plus a senior executive from our buyer January th File and request an expedited process It would be extremelly helpful if you could identify someone for the Head of our Regulatory Group Jim Steffes to coordinate with at Citi Thanks Louise

Delivery Status Notification Delaypst This is an automatically generated Delivery Status Notification THIS IS A WARNING MESSAGE ONLY YOU DO NOT NEED TO RESEND YOUR MESSAGE Delivery to the following recipients has been delayed Inline attachment follows From OENRONOUNACNRECIPIENTSCNJPARKS To Date Monday April GMT Subject Original Message From Mccall Tom EKT mailto Sent Thursday February AM To Parks Joe Subject RE RESUME Hey Joe I wanted to follow up with yaI talked with Tracy Dillee in our HR our trading managers Unforntunately they said they didnt have a good fit right now but definitely wanted to keep your resume on file They may have other opportunities over time so I would recommend you checking back or talking with Tracy She can be reached at just ask for her name Good luck and stay in touch Tom Original Message From Parks Joe SMTPJoe NRONcom Sent Wednesday February AM To TOM NTERGYKOCHCOM Subject RESUME Thanks for fowarding my resume Let me know if you have any questions Thanks Mccall Tom EKT Joe JHPdoc This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant affiliate and may contain confidential and privileged material for the sole use of the intended recipient s Any review use distribution or disclosure by others is strictly prohibited If you are not the intended recipient or authorized to receive for the recipient please contact the sender or reply to Enron Corp at and delete all copies of the message This email and any attachments hereto are not intended to be an offer or an acceptance and do not create or evidence a binding and enforceable contract between Enron Corp or any of its affiliates and the intended recipient or any other party and may not be relied on by anyone as the basis of a contract by estoppel or otherwise Thank you File JHPdoc

Delivery Status Notification RelayThis is an automatically generated Delivery Status Notification Your message has been successfully relayed to the following recipients but the requested delivery status notifications may not be generated by the destination Inline attachment follows From OENRONOUNACNRECIPIENTSCNRSHAPIRO To Date Sunday November GMT Subject Ken Thanks for the note I too am trying to be optimistic but there is far too much uncertainty for me and more importantly my family with Enron being in a constant state of teetering There are few places in Houston which is where it is our strong preference to stay that interest me but Dynegy is one of them Please let me know when would be a good time to talk if it makes sense at all from your perspective Thanks again Rick Original Message From Sent Sat PM To Shapiro Richard Cc Subject Re The future Rick Thanks for the note The reduction in budget to million is indeed dramatic but appears to be necessary under the circumstances We continure to be optimistic also but I certainly understand the need to be realistic Hope you have gotten some rest and I look forward to speaking with you next week Ken PS you and Steve Kean and the rest of your government affairs team can be proud of all you have accomplished in advocating deregulation in natural gas and power markets in the US and abroad

Delivery Status Notification RelayThis is an automatically generated Delivery Status Notification Your message has been successfully relayed to the following recipients but the requested delivery status notifications may not be generated by the destination Inline attachment follows From OENRONOUNACNRECIPIENTSCNRSHAPIRO To Date Friday November GMT Subject Ken Im not sure where the acquisition of Enron by Dynegy is going or not ultimately nor am I seeking any unique insights Time and other cirumstances will dictate the outcome Since we last spoke about layoffs in my group the situation has grown worseas of the moment and assuming no further erosion the North American group directly under my charge will shrink next week to professionals and support staff and a budget of million dollars down from million dollars in In addition Europe Government Affairs will likely shrink to no more than professionals and a budget of approximately dollars The layoffs are slated for sometime in the upcoming weekweek of November with people departing the same day they are given notice As you can imagine this is a particularly painful process especially since I hired most of these people as we were building what I considered and will always consider to be a worldclass organization We not only built a group of Government Affairs professionals who were talented hardworking and who had many successes at opening energy markets but who also with few exceptions embodied a set of values eg honesty integrity decency toward others friend or foe that were not always as plentiful throughout the Enron culture as many including myself would have hoped To cut to the quick Im tired of the weight that burdens all of us who remain at Enron I can explain this further and am actively seeking a change in my personal circumstances Steve Kean knows I am looking but doesnt know specifically about this noteI dont believe he would object given the context I have thought long and hard about sending this noteit is not easily done I have also thought about whether it will be percieved as abandonment of my group if I were to move on soonThis may be a rationalization but after seeing through next weeks layoffs there is little left to do that has not already beeen done I also believe that and you may talk to folks in my group for validation I have done the very best I could for them over the last few months under challenging circumstances Bottom line my skills and personal network that I believe are considerable will be grossly underutilized at Enron over the next months if I were to stay If the acquisition stays on track this view may not be exactly right Id be happy to talk about this with you further if you so desire In addition to my work and email I can always be reached at home Thanks very much Rick

Delivery Status Notification RelayThis is an automatically generated Delivery Status Notification Your message has been successfully relayed to the following recipients but the requested delivery status notifications may not be generated by the destination Inline attachment follows From OENRONOUNACNRECIPIENTSCNRSHAPIRO To Date Thursday December GMT Subject Arthur We dont really know each other but we have been at functions together since our children Ellen and Ben are in second grade together at Cooper While Im still at Enron one of the few I am diligently developing future opportunities for myself in the wake of the unfortunate events at Enron Since I cant help but read great things about your company I thought I would send you a short note to determine if Lexicon might have any interest in someone with a strong governmentregulatory affairs background While Im assessing a few offers at the moment they are out of Texas and would require relocation My desire is to stay here While I havent been doing my line of work in your industry Im a quick study Im good at what I do my style at Enron was very different from the reputation of the company low key but effective and the idea of learning a new industry and applying my skills in a new setting is quite appealing I know Lexicon has constant interaction with varrious facets of government but I dont fully know how you currently staff those needs and whether someone with my background could be of useThus my note Below are various ways to contact me if there is any interest Thanks for taking the time to consider this note and Happy HolidaysRick Shapiro Richard S Shapiro hm wk cell mailto Shapiro resumedoc

Delivery Status Notification RelayThis is an automatically generated Delivery Status Notification Your message has been successfully relayed to the following recipients but the requested delivery status notifications may not be generated by the destination Inline attachment follows From OENRONOUNACNRECIPIENTSCNJSTEPENO To Date Tuesday October GMT Subject I hope this answers your questions me Original Message From Jonda Stowell ENRON Sent Tuesday October AM To Stepenovitch Joe Cc Donn Fullenweider Subject RE Stepenovitch Dear Joe In order to prepare your case for trial several things are necessary as follows Depositions must be taken of you and Tonya We must send discovery to Tonya and we must have sufficient time pursuant to the Texas Rules of Civil Procedure for it to be answered prior to trial The Court will require mediation before we can go to trial The Court will appoint a mental health examiner and possible an attorney ad litem to represent Paytons best interests This is now a case where custody and possession are an issue and these steps MUST be taken before we can proceed to trial Initially after paternity was established and you first visited with Payton your desire was that all possession periods would be worked out by agreement and neither you nor Tonya wanted any more court proceedings However since then Tonya has bucked your every request for visitation and put limitations of one kind or another on it turning the case into a custody case Without discovery to Tonya similar to the discovery we answered for you and Tonyas deposition and a mental health evaluation we are not prepared for trial and the Court would not be ready to hear the case and entertain what was in Paytons best interest Therefore Mr Fullenweider did not opposed Stewart Gagnons motion for continuance and would have in fact have filed one himself in keeping with your best interest and Paytons in mind As I explained we are working on a Request for Temporary Orders which I expect will be set on along with the hearing on mental evaluations At that time I expect the court to set your possession periods with Payton including holidays Until then we must work on scheduling your possession periods by agreement To confirm your November rd visitation period you have chosen to have Payton from noon to pm in Vero Beach on the rd and will forego November th Where will you pick up and drop off Payton Jonda Original Message From mailto Sent Tuesday October AM To Subject RE Stepenovitch Good Morning Jonda I received the papers from you yesterday about the continuance I was under the impression that it was the court moving the date It looks like to me its Tonya and her Lawyer They have been doing pushing this case back from the start and Im sure they are doing this for a reason to say to the jury that a bond has been created and its not in the best interest of the child to go with his father after being with his mother for so long At this point if we go to trial Payton will be year old and I will have only seen him about times I dont think I will win that battle As for the November th court date will we have something in writing by the judge so I can start having my rights I feel like her and her lawyer can tell us what to do and we must follow there rules Will this change or do I have to go through this until the April court date That cant be how is system works I should have the right to pick my own son up whenever I want and no court or lawyer or even his mother should have anything to say about that I dont understand why everything is against me Finally for the weekend of Nov st I will take my son for the whole day in Vero on Saturday and forego Sunday Joe Original Message From Jonda Stowell ENRON Sent Friday October PM To Stepenovitch Joe Subject Stepenovitch Dear Joe I just received a phone call from Miryam Mitchell She said if you would like to take Payton to Vero Beach on Saturday November rd you may have him from to if you are willing to forego visitation on Sunday and let Tonya have him all day on Sunday If youd prefer this let me know It is your call Jonda L Stowell Legal Assistant The Fullenweider Firm San
